languages.text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills a daemon or xenos, they immediately get rid of disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, and fatigued effects.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

languages.text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Убив демона или ксеноса, обладатель мгновенно избавляется от эффектов тревожности, замешательства, ослепления, ошеломления, замедления и усталости.
Убив демона или ксеноса, обладатель мгновенно избавляется от эффектов тревожности, замешательства, ослепления, ошеломления, замедления и усталости.

Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.

languages.text: 装备者获得无尽狂怒这一{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 发动此能力后，装备者当前的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。 同时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}，效果持续至战斗结束。 此能力每轮只能使用一次，所有效果均可叠加。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得无尽狂怒这一{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 发动此能力后，装备者当前的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。 同时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}，效果持续至战斗结束。 此能力每轮只能使用一次，所有效果均可叠加。

装备者获得无尽狂怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 发动此能力后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。 不过，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}会提高，等同于{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，装备者所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}，效果持续至战斗结束。 此能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都可以使用一次，所有的效果都可以叠加。

languages.text: El portador gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Furia implacable . Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del portador a la mitad hasta el final del combate. Sin embargo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} del portador aumenta en +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % hasta el final del combate. Esta capacidad puede usarse una vez por asalto y todos sus efectos se acumulan.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del portador a la mitad hasta el final del combate. Sin embargo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} del portador aumenta en +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % hasta el final del combate. Esta capacidad puede usarse una vez por asalto y todos sus efectos se acumulan.

El portador gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Furia implacable . Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del portador a la mitad hasta el final del combate. Sin embargo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} del portador aumenta en+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % hasta el final del combate. Esta capacidad puede usarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y todos sus efectos se acumulan.

languages.text: 保有者は無慈悲な怒りの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。 このアビリティは、次の戦闘終了時まで、保有者の現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を半分に減少させる。 ただし戦闘終了時まで、保有者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}％増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}増加する。 このアビリティは1ラウンドにつき1回使用できる。効果はすべてスタックする。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: 保有者は無慈悲な怒りの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。 このアビリティは、次の戦闘終了時まで、保有者の現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を半分に減少させる。 ただし戦闘終了時まで、保有者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}％増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}増加する。 このアビリティは1ラウンドにつき1回使用できる。効果はすべてスタックする。

使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}無慈悲な怒りを獲得する。 このアビリティは、戦闘終了まで、使用者の現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を半分に減少させる。 ただし戦闘終了まで、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% 増加する。 このアビリティは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき1回使用できて、効果はすべて蓄積する。

languages.text: Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Erbarmungsloser Zorn. Diese Fähigkeit halbiert die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung {/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Der {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich allerdings um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} %. Sein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erhöht sich bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Diese Fähigkeit kann nur einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden. Alle Effekte sind stapelbar.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Erbarmungsloser Zorn. Diese Fähigkeit halbiert die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung {/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Der {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich allerdings um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} %. Sein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erhöht sich bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}. Diese Fähigkeit kann nur einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden. Alle Effekte sind stapelbar.

Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Erbarmungsloser Zorn. Diese Fähigkeit verringert die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um die Hälfte. Allerdings wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} des Trägers um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht und sein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht. Diese Fähigkeit kann ein Mal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} genutzt werden und all ihre Effekte werden aufaddiert.

languages.text: L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Rage impitoyable. Cette capacité réduit de moitié l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} actuelles de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cependant, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent respectivement de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette capacité peut être utilisée une fois par round. Tous les effets se cumulent.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Rage impitoyable. Cette capacité réduit de moitié l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} actuelles de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cependant, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent respectivement de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette capacité peut être utilisée une fois par round. Tous les effets se cumulent.

L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Rage Impitoyable. Cette capacité réduit de moitié l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} actuelles de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cependant, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent respectivement de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette capacité peut être utilisée une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et tous ses effets se cumulent.

languages.text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, Amansız Öfke {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyet, kullanan kişinin mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yarıya düşürür. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bununla beraber kullanıcının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} +%{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} ise +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} kadar artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu kabiliyet, her rauntta bir kez kullanılabilir. Tüm etkiler üst üste birikebilir.

This ability can be used once per round. All effects stack.
